text: Abaffe tebatambulangako mu nsi nebalaba yali etya enkomerero y'abo abaabakulembera! (ate) nga baali babasinga amaanyi era baayiikuula ensi era ne bagizimba okusinga nga bano bwe baagizimba era ababaka baabwe baabaleetera obunnyonnyofu, n'olwekyo Katonda teyali wa kubayisa bubi wabula bo bennyini be beeyisa obubi
